attributes.action: make The Revenue Management fully accountable for failing to implement basic encryption security to protect UK Citizens and their children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why such an oversight we ask in astonishment? The situation regarding the 'misplacement' of 25 million UK Citizens data beggars belief? Encryption is understood by almost anyone who uses the internet and we would ask why The Revenue has failed to implement such a vital standard procedure? We would also question why a junior member of staff would be able to access and download this type of information without supervision and protected passwords?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
